Primary Contact: Jennifer Pfliger, Program Manager; Email: jpfliger@okanaganmentalhealth.com
Service Details: - Offers comfortable safe home environments that support independence to individuals diagnosed with a persistent mental illness- Provides rehabilitation services based on individual needs, preferences and life choices -Long-term support and short term intensive rehabilitative support- Must be referred by Interior Health Mental Health Services
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) - 60 year(s)Must have good mobility, as all of our homes have stairs.
How to Apply: Referral required through Interior Health Community Integrated Health Services
